post.body: You're rockin the UAD2? Nice! I spent much time lusting over the orginal UAD.
I'll drink to that! *raises bottle*
Hey there, from a former Hoosier (Crawfordsville)! I enjoyed listening to your perspective on the latest Pro Photo Show.
Moto xmas party?
Yikes!
Congrats! I LOVE the color of the green paint in the kitchen.
Do you have a basement, or crawlspace? Does the Dept of Water know that you're liveing there?
Givee Akiset a try: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/akismet/
Full-throttled chainsaw with distortion and a tape delay?
"The Dude abides." Speaking of The Big Lebowski, a Caucasian sounds pretty tasty now.
Falling asleep at desk; time for bed. Gotta be out the door by 8:30AM for wedding. Yes, 8:30 in the morning. G'night my children!
Ordering some printed postcards of the wife's baby shower invite for her Chicago peeps. http://www.mpix.com
Just spent an hour shoveling snow out of our parking space and alley. The car now has an 87% chance of not getting stuck. I'm tuckered!
Ice 'javelins' are falling from the tops of buildings in downtown Chicago. I need to go to the hardware store and procure a hardhat.
Music video: Muse - Knights of Cydonia http://poprl.com/92s I love this song, and the video is flippin cool!
Here's a nifty Wordpress plugin that allows you to link WordPress pages or posts directly to a URL http://poprl.com/92m
Listening to: Celldweller http://www.celldweller.com
Boy am I glad that my new warm winter boots were at home while I trudged a mile through 4 inches of snow. My toes are thawing out now.
Calibrating monitors. When was the last time you calibrated?
Beck's "Timebomb" is having auditory intercourse with my eardrums. http://poprl.com/8Yb
Prepping the set for our 2008 holiday card photo. Gotta one-up last years. People have been asking us about this years photo. Excitement!
Just bought a new baby stroller for $7! Thanks to the GWO girls for the gift card.
About to head out for my morning fix of caffeine and stimulate the local economy.
After nearly a year, we finally took our car to the body shop for repair. Danialle rearranged the front end using a U-turn and a truck. :-)
FYI, 'A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master' is my favorite of the series. "One.. Two.. Freddy is coming for you..."
Went to Subway to grab a sandwich and was greeted with amazingly apathetic and rude service. I told the "manager" he was rude - he laughed.
Here is how I spent the first day of last year: http://poprl.com/Aj1
Just woke up! Preparing to go eat heavy metal themed hamburgers a Kuma's Corner http://poprl.com/AfX *guitar solo*
Dabbling with http://www.animoto.com. Very cool concept. Check out my first 30-second "Short" http://poprl.com/ASf
Listening to 'Chinese Democracy' as I prepare a new image for the blog. The tunes rock, despite Axl's loose grip on consensus reality.
Walking around the apartment, getting accustomed with the R-Strap. Pretty cool. But will give it a real test drive at wedding on Sat.
My $48(!) camera strap, a BlackRapid RS-4 (http://tinyurl.com/6c4bh5), magically appeared today. Yay!
Designed and printed a neat baby shower invitation for Danialle. Check it out here: http://tinyurl.com/8vh29t
Instead of completing today's tasks, I'm checking out 'Things', a task management app for the Mac and iPhone http://tinyurl.com/2eo4k5
Check out my newly acquired pair of rad and somewhat large glasses http://tinyurl.com/8v2n2u
Still, after 3 years of owning a dog and thus picking up said dog's poo, I wonder if Kaboom (my dog) would do the same for me?
New photo posted at the blog: Danialle - 28 Weeks | http://tinyurl.com/7f4ltk
Spent day with visiting family. Did some swimming in their hotel pool. Preparing to feed upon an episode of True Blood. Beer & pretzels!
While out, Mr. UPS blessed me with the wife's printed baby shower invites. They look fan-freakin-tastic! Printed by Pro DPI, they rock!
Back from a day spent at a mall with BIL, SIL, N&N. Ate at Rainforest Cafe, bought some new threads, and watched numerous egos walkabout.
